snippet.title: Lost Words - NY Videogame Awards Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Revealed at the 2020 NY Videogame Awards: Get a glimpse of the fantasy world of Estoria and the moving emotional journey of Izzy, a young writer using creativity and her journal to deal with the adventures of life.  Izzy’s worlds - both imaginary and real - come to life through the pages of her diary in this evocative exploration of hope, joy, and resilience. Wishlist now on Steam: https://modus.games/lostwords-steam

Learn about Lost Words!
Official Website: http://lostwordsgame.com 
Steam Page: https://modus.games/lostwords-steam

Join the Modus Community!
